There used to be an adult game on this site that had you interacting with various Marvel and DC superheroines in an effort to complete a quest, I believe it was stopping Doom from doing something. I remember interacting with Sue Storm, Enchantress, and Scarlet Witch, but the game doesn't seem to exist anymore?

Anyone know if it's still around and I just can't find it?
